dialogue: We're changing the name of our staffing group to "talent acquisition."
This reflects our new focus on hiring only highly talented people.
Doesn't that imply that your current employees are inferior to the ones you plan to hire?
And since you routinely fire the worst performing employees...
You have just sealed our doom while expecting us to remain loyal to the company.
Now all I can think about are ways to vandalize the servers before I become homeless.
